caption.title: More warm years and concurrent warm and dry periods.
caption.p: ( A) Number of years with a positive temperature anomaly that is greater than 1, 2, and 3 SD levels from the baseline period average for RCP8.5. ( B) Percent chance of occurrence of high temperature (>1 SD) and different drought types for RCP8.5. ( C) Percent chance of occurrence of high temperature (>1 SD) and different drought types for RCP4.5. ( D) Number of events resulting in concurrent occurrence of multiple drought types for each 30-year time slice.
